content.query:
-- execute against serverless master
CREATE LOGIN [purview-cn32xts6vteh6] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER

-- execute against serverless default db
CREATE USER [purview-cn32xts6vteh6] FROM LOGIN [purview-cn32xts6vteh6]

-- execute against serverless AdventureWorksLTServerless db
CREATE USER [purview-cn32xts6vteh6] FROM LOGIN [purview-cn32xts6vteh6]



ALTER ROLE db_datareader ADD MEMBER [purview-cn32xts6vteh6]
USE DP500DWH
CREATE USER [purview-cn32xts6vteh6] FROM LOGIN [purview-cn32xts6vteh6]
ALTER ROLE db_datareader ADD MEMBER [purview-cn32xts6vteh6]
